title: How Cowboys can change; More focused Mahomes? Training camp brawls; Packers WR Allen Lazard
itunes:title: How Cowboys can change; More focused Mahomes? Training camp brawls; Packers WR Allen Lazard
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins reacting to Jerry Jones’ comments from Dallas Cowboys training camp. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty explain how this year can be different than the previous disappointing years for the Cowboys. Next, Peter leads the “we in or we out” segment and they discuss if a brawl can be good for a training camp locker room. Later, the GMFB panel reacts to Patrick Mahomes’ training camp thoughts on the competitive AFC West and they wonder if we’re going to see a more focused Mahomes this season. The show finishes up being joined by Packers WR Allen Lazard and he talks about his journey to the NFL, his role with the Packers with Davante Adams on another team, and what it’s like to work with Aaron Rodgers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
